constraints.name: multiple_or_square
constraints.description: 选取的元素必须是给定数的倍数或小于该数的完全平方数
constraints.formal: k % n == 0 or (sqrt(k) is integer and k < n)

constraints.name: alternating_turns
constraints.description: 两名玩家轮流进行操作，先手开始
constraints.formal: player1 -> player2 -> player1 -> ... until no valid move

constraints.name: game_termination
constraints.description: 当没有合法的操作时，当前玩家输掉游戏
constraints.formal: if no valid k, current player loses
